podcasts.title: PURPOSE GOD’S WAY- “Being directed by God as you pursue Purpose”
podcasts.description:
Many a times we walk through life seeking all forms of advice, clues to help us know if we are on the right path. We also know based on the results we get as we apply ourselves in the areas of our calling be it at work, in a project, at home/family whether we are on the right track.

Join me as I share how God's word has helped me know the direction I ought to take at any given time of my Life as the scripture says in Psalms 119:105 KJV- Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.

Join me in the prayer of Agreement to ask God to direct every path you take.

podcasts.title: PURPOSE GOD’S WAY- “Finishing well”
podcasts.description:
We all go through transitions in life, one door opens and another closes. That is Life. When one is in transition however, there is need to finish well, despite the circumstances.

Let us be reminded that -The end of a matter is better than its beginning, and patience is better than pride. Ecclesiastes 7:8 NIV

Join me in the prayer of Agreement asking God to help you finish well.

podcasts.title: PURPOSE GOD’S WAY- “being a wise master Builder”
podcasts.description:
What does it mean to be a wise master builder? As you go about building in your career, family, business you need wisdom to know how to build and ensure what you build is firm and secure. 1 Corinthians 3:10-11 says According to the grace of God which is given unto me, as a wise masterbuilder, I have laid the foundation, and another buildeth thereon. But let every man take heed how he buildeth thereupon.11 For other foundation can no man lay than that is laid, which is Jesus Christ.

Join me in the prayer of agreement to ask God make you a Wise Master Builder

podcasts.title: PURPOSE GOD’S WAY-Practice Patience in Seasons of Delay
podcasts.description:
Ever found yourself growing impatient waiting for a promise to be fulfilled, for a breakthrough, or simply for a change? Ever felt your timelines are not aligning with God's? I've been there too, and I understand your frustration.

Drawing inspiration from Habakkuk 2:1, I offer perspective and encouragement for anyone in a season of waiting, emphasizing that our visions will certainly come to pass at the appointed time.

podcasts.title: PURPOSE GOD'S WAY- Journeying Life with God's Unwavering Help
podcasts.description:
Mercy delves into the spiritual support available to us in times of doubt and uncertainty. We are reminded of the comforting words in Psalms 46:1, "God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble." This verse assures us of God's unwavering help in troubled times, giving us the courage to face our fears and pursue our dreams.

In the journey towards achieving our dreams, we often encounter various forms of trouble. These troubles can take many forms, from resource constraints to skill deficits, to self-doubt. However, we are reminded that nothing catches God by surprise. He is our refuge and strength, our ever-present help in times of trouble.

We are encouraged to run to God in these times of trouble. To trust in His strength and guidance as we strive to actualize our dreams. As we turn to Him, we can draw from His strength, knowing that He is our ever-present help in times of need.
podcasts.iframe: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/episode/5o5LHdBuDtvdpb10wIWjXS?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="150" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

podcasts.title: PURPOSE GOD’S WAY- Inviting God into Every Detail of your Life Journey
podcasts.description: Navigating life's journey can often feel like a solitary endeavor. We make decisions, face challenges, and chart our course often relying solely on our understanding. However, the wisdom found in Proverbs 16:3 - "Commit to the Lord whatever you do, and He will establish your plans" - suggests a different approach. This approach invites us to not just seek God's help when we're in crisis, but to include Him in every detail of our journey. This divine partnership is the core focus of our latest podcast episode, "Purpose God's Way."
podcasts.iframe: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/episode/6Iu6ERsqM0GUJaRCicRZb0?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="150" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

podcasts.title: PURPOSE GOD’S WAY- Exploring Our Divine Purpose through God's Word
podcasts.description:
In life, we often find ourselves at crossroads, searching for direction and purpose. It's in these moments that we can find solace and guidance in God's word, particularly in Jeremiah 33:3. This scripture, rich with promise and assurance, encourages us to call upon God for he will answer and reveal great and unsearchable things we do not know.

Mercy encourages and inspires listeners to reflect on their path, call on God's name, and patiently wait for His unsearchable answers. I hope you are inspired and encouraged by this episode, as I share my journey of faith and purpose.
podcasts.iframe: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/episode/4qkuF1neyV9OVls07LJdaL?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="150" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

podcasts.title: PURPOSE GOD’S WAY- Overcoming Fear and Leaning on God's Promises in Isaiah 41:10
podcasts.description:
Are you ever overwhelmed by fear? You're not alone. I've been there, paralyzed by the enormity of the divine purpose I feel God has laid before me. Even praying, something I love, becomes a daunting task. Yet, in those moments, I find solace in Isaiah 41:10, where God promises to provide strength, support, and help. Now, imagine what if you could lean on this promise, relying on God's guiding hand to navigate through life's trials?

Join me in a deeply personal discussion about grappling with fear and feeling overwhelmed. We'll confront our fears and admit our anxieties together, drawing strength from the promise encapsulated in Isaiah 41:10. Through a heartfelt prayer, we'll affirm our belief in God's unwavering support, and His pledge to strengthen, uphold, and help us, despite our fears. Let's walk this journey together, leaning on God's promise, and find our faith uplifted, our fears dispelled, and our lives guided by His promise. It's time to face fear and rise above it, with God by our side.
podcasts.iframe: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/episode/6YDALNclLcNsyS1Mb9n3qy?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="150" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

podcasts.title: PURPOSE GOD’S WAY- Understanding the Interplay of Spirituality and Career Advancement
podcasts.description:
There is a mystery and power in faith that has been transforming lives for millennia. This truth has been revealed in our latest podcast episode featuring a compelling conversation with Claire, a professional from the telecommunications field, who graciously shares her journey of faith and growth. Her story illustrates how faith in the smallest things has led her towards significant personal and professional growth.

Claire's narrative paints a vivid picture of the role faith plays in growth. She began her journey in the nascent stage of the telecommunications industry in Kenya, where mobile phones were a foreign concept. Her faithfulness and commitment to learning propelled her to a successful career. But it was her faith in God that remained the constant driving force behind her growth, echoing the biblical teaching that growth comes from God.

In our conversation, Claire brings to life the teachings of Jesus on prayer and growth. The Lord's Prayer, she believes, serves as a compass guiding us to seek daily increase and forgiveness. We are encouraged to call upon divine help in times of struggle, emphasizing the crucial role faith plays in our personal and professional lives. Claire's insights reveal the power of prayer as a tool for seeking guidance and growth, illuminating uncharted waters of faith and growth.

Prayer is more than a 911 call to God in times of crisis; it is an active conversation and a way of life. Claire reflects on how her prayer life evolved from 911 prayers to a deep, enriching dialogue with God, where she sought more than just emergency help. She shares how she yearned for a better way of engaging God, emphasizing the importance of seeking daily increase from God through prayer.

Faithfulness in small things, as Claire's story illustrates, is a key principle for growth. Whether in career progression, in relationships, or in our spiritual lives, being faithful in small matters is a stepping stone to bigger responsibilities and growth. Faithfulness and prayer thus emerge as integral components of growth.

The podcast concludes with a powerful prayer led by Claire, drawing on the teachings of the Lord's Prayer. She prays for those seeking growth, asking for daily increase, forgiveness, and divine help to pull them out of difficult situations. The prayer serves as a reminder that growth is a process and faithfulness in small things is the foundation for substantial growth.
podcasts.iframe: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/episode/3NPwRisNxKNutJFDlDYfTf?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="150" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

podcasts.title: PURPOSE GOD’S WAY- Dynamics of Purpose & being prone to Abuse
podcasts.description:
Have you ever found yourself drained, unmotivated, and just generally out of alignment? You're not alone; my dear friend Maggie and I take you on an explorative journey to uncover the concept of 'Purpose', which we define as your life's true calling. Labeling it as something far beyond a 'nine to five' job, we delve into the signs that might reveal you're not walking in your purpose—including a lack of passion or motivation, and feeling stuck in an abusive or unsatisfying situation.

In this episode, we also shine a light on the transformative power of prayer, particularly when it comes to deliverance and healing. With the understanding that dark times can often lead us astray from our purpose, we discuss how reaching out to God can free us from sin and oppression, helping us find our way back. We zero in on the battle against drug abuse, sexual immorality, and prostitution, offering prayers and extending our trust in divine guidance for those in need. Don't miss our powerful conversation around self-discovery, personal transformation, and spiritual healing.

These feelings of discontentment and un- fulfillment are not to be dismissed. They're your soul's way of signaling that something is amiss—that you're not walking in your purpose. Acknowledging these feelings is the first step towards realignment with your true calling.

In the midst of these dark times, when you feel lost and astray from your purpose, prayer can serve as a powerful guiding light. Our podcast episode emphasizes the transformative power of prayer, particularly in delivering us from sin and oppression. We discuss how reaching out to God can help us find our way back to our true purpose.

Our conversation is not just about discovering your life's purpose—it's about living it. It's about recognizing when you're not walking in your purpose and taking the necessary steps to align with it. It's about harnessing the power of prayer to overcome challenges and reconnect with your divine purpose.

This journey of self-discovery and transformation isn't easy, but it's undoubtedly worthwhile. As you embark on this path to uncover your purpose, remember that you're not alone. Together, through prayer and trust in divine guidance, we can all find our way back to our life's true calling.
podcasts.iframe: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/episode/7DwDcqLsrJQPH529jA7yUq?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="150" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

podcasts.title: PURPOSE GOD’S WAY-Being the Light in the Marketplace
podcasts.description:
Have you considered that you can serve God within your secular job? That's exactly what we discuss in the second part of our conversation, challenging the prevalent African belief that spirituality and professional life should remain separate entities. Taking inspiration from the Biblical figure Daniel, we explore the possibility of integrating spiritual growth within our work life and how these roles can be a stepping stone towards fulfilling our purpose. We also touch upon the necessity to acknowledge unconventional careers, like photography or music, as legitimate paths to purpose.

Listen to Holy Spirit and be on God’s side as you are the light of the world.
podcasts.iframe: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/episode/50VErVaC3kidf65UsNkPGa?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="150" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

podcasts.title: PURPOSE GOD’S WAY- How do you Pursue Purpose and Partner with God
podcasts.description:
What is your purpose in life? How do you find it? These are questions that many of us grapple with throughout our lives. In this podcast episode, we delve into the complex concept of purpose, exploring it through personal experiences, societal pressures, and biblical narratives.

We begin the conversation by reflecting on our own journeys of purpose discovery. My guest, Maggie, candidly shares how she felt lost for a while, not knowing how to pursue her purpose or even recognizing when a season in her life had changed. I share my experiences of being raised with intention, which gave me the ability to navigate life after school. We also discuss societal changes and the pressures that African parents often put on their children to pursue certain careers, which can deter them from their true path.

The conversation takes an interesting turn as we challenge the prevalent African belief that spirituality and professional life should remain separate entities. We explore the example of the biblical figure Daniel, who served God in his secular job. This concept of integrating spirituality within our work life challenges traditional views, but we believe that these roles can be a stepping stone towards fulfilling our purpose.

One of the highlights of this episode is our discussion about the influential role of parents in shaping their children's sense of purpose. We explore how parents can create an atmosphere of exploration, allowing their children to discover their abilities and gifts. This involves acknowledging unconventional careers, like photography or music, as legitimate paths to purpose.

Parents play a significant role in guiding their children towards their purpose. This is not just about supporting them in their interests but also partnering with God to reveal their unique gifts and calling. Through prayer and the wisdom of the Holy Spirit, parents can lead their children in the direction they should go.
podcasts.iframe: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/episode/3z7iAUznMss8dPxrpOWoVV?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="150" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

podcasts.title: PURPOSE GOD’S WAY- Exploring the Power of God's Word and Prayer
podcasts.description:
The power of the Word of God in transforming the lives of believers is an incredible phenomenon. It shapes the spiritual growth of individuals, guiding them in the right direction and fortifying them with faith and courage to face life's challenges. Today, we delve into the spiritual journey of Claire, a believer who has experienced the transformative power of God's Word and prayer.

Claire's journey from 911 prayers to a place of growth provides an insightful understanding of the transformative power of God's Word. As a new believer, she experienced how being led by God and the practice of Bible study and prayer are instrumental in spiritual growth. The Word of God, particularly scriptures like 1 Timothy 4:13 and 1 Peter 4:13, played a significant role in her spiritual maturation. These verses emphasize the importance of public reading of Scripture, fostering an environment of learning and spiritual growth.

Claire's story beautifully illustrates the transformative power of prayer. She discovered how faith can be a powerful tool in navigating challenging times. Prayer's potency is such that it can offer strength and direction when needed the most. Meditation on God's Word, she realized, provides profound insight into its truths and acts as a guiding light, illuminating the path in life.

In her spiritual journey, Claire also encountered the opening verse from John's Gospel. Its relevance in today's life is a topic worth contemplating. She moved from a superficial engagement with faith to a deep, intimate relationship with God. Her story stands testament to the life-altering power of God's Word, inspiring others to delve deeper into their faith.
Explore the podcast
podcasts.iframe: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/episode/4b1PvYPjsy7yOv5d5tOVZQ?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="150" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

podcasts.title: PURPOSE GOD’S WAY- Finding Purpose
podcasts.description:
PURPOSE GOD’S WAY- Finding Purpose: A Journey through Personal Experience and Biblical Narratives

Have you ever wondered how to navigate the intricacies of your life's purpose? Join us today as we unlock the concept of purpose with my friend Maggie. From feeling lost and uncertain, to discovering her life’s mission, Mercy shares her transformative experiences and insights. Delving into personal tales and biblical narratives, we discuss the societal and familial pressures that can often deter us from our true path, particularly within the African context.
Picture yourself at the crossroads of your life, the world in the grip of a pandemic, and yet, you feel a divine calling.

This episode features I shared my story, who not only felt this calling but also pursued it fearlessly to start her digital company amidst global chaos. I share my riveting journey of seeking God's guidance, the importance of prayer, and how destiny helpers played a pivotal role in her success. The conversation beautifully illuminates the power of taking small steps towards your dreams, even when plagued with fear.

In the second half, we shift gears to discuss the essence of gratitude in our lives. We explore how thanking God for our blessings, the people around us, and the resources he provides us with, can create a profound impact. We delve into the power of prayer and trusting God's plan in the larger scheme of things. As we wrap up, we offer a heartfelt blessing for our listeners, hoping that Mercy’s story of resilience and faith will serve as a beacon of inspiration. Tune in and let's embark on this life-changing journey together.

My desire is that most of us are awakened to the fact that Time and Chance happens to them all.

podcasts.title: This world is for the Takers
podcasts.description: Like everything else in life, one has to be aware that you have to seize the opportunity and when it actually present itself In this generation, most people are waiting to be handed over opportunity, they are waiting either for the connected or rich parent, uncle, relative to connect with an opportunity. As a world changer –one has to be willing to take the opportunities that present themselves. Most often they are not covered in glitz and glamour- they come in form of work! HARD WORK. So, go and be a world taker- You have all that you need inside of you to seek the opportunity and seize it.
podcasts.iframe: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/episode/6dRXdE7xGBX8R8gva7QZNu?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="150" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

podcasts.title: Taking Stock of the Year
podcasts.description: It’s the end of another year. It is important to take stock of the year and be able to gauge from an honest perspective and note your areas of improvement. Also appreciate the disappointments which you might have experienced as you pursued purpose. Don’t be scared of the process of stock taking, It makes you appreciate your milestones as well as enable you to plan better for the coming year. Join me as I share with you some of my tips as I take stock of the year that has been and how it has enabled me to start the new year focused to pursue purpose.
podcasts.iframe: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/episode/7BQdaNsjJhKHH2bOVMfCb8?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="150" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

podcasts.title: Positioning yourself for a promotion
podcasts.description: How do you position yourself for a promotion at the workplace? Do you desire and are taking deliberate actions towards positioning yourself for a promotion? Join me as we discuss how you can work towards positioning yourself for a promotion. Growth is for those who desire it and intentionally pursue it.
podcasts.iframe: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/episode/694TOFhU2SCuC4YTBaMmWR?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="150" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

podcasts.title: Performance Reviews & Attitude Management
podcasts.description: How to self check and prepare yourself when you are undergoing your annual or quarterly performance review. In order for you to remain focused and sharp, you must prepare for your review and check your attitude so that you can be effective in receiving and giving feedback. We shall look at why It is important to have an Attitude Check as you prepare for your Performance Review. A winning attitude ultimately leads to one that seeks to see organizations grow and perform at their best. Most organizations reward good performance- Push yourself and be one who stands out from the rest.
podcasts.iframe: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/episode/6PaBHl9dVJlzLyAk8ImyZA?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="150" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

podcasts.title: Introducing Josephine Kimai (My Coach)
podcasts.description: I am big on coaching. I am a beneficiary of going through coaching exercises over the years. Introducing my Coach- Josephine Kimai to take us through the benefits of coaching. You can reach out to her at a personal level on. Name: Josephine Kimai . Company Name: Vital Solutions Africa . Website: www.vitalsolutionsafrica.com

podcasts.title: Discouragement at the Work Place
podcasts.description: As we work, we encounter many levels of discouragements that deter us from pushing forward or pursuing the purpose in which we are intended to. Listen in as I share: 1. Sources of Discouragement. 2. Causes of Discouragement And How to overcome discouragement and maintain sanity at the workplace.
podcasts.iframe: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/episode/3iCtaNghRf11sJ8fJhOrQa?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="150" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

podcasts.title: Applying Emotional Intelligence at the Workplace
podcasts.description: Get to learn how to apply Emotional Intelligence at the workplace to avoid continuous conflict and promotion self awareness as a manager and colleague.
podcasts.iframe: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/episode/6Aj59AApg1xlLx1XAmGHey?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="150" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

podcasts.title: Toxic Work Environment
podcasts.description: Today, we shall explore the toxic work environment. 1.What is this? 2.How does it affect you and the output of your work? 3.How can we avoid it? Each work season expose us to different work Environments and therefore, when you encounter a toxic work environment, you are to overcome and come it and keep walking in your career journey without wavering as What doesn’t break you-Makes you stronger!
podcasts.iframe: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/episode/3WwtMpWNpZUIBNwbhNmD5X?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="150" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

podcasts.title: Bad Boss Alert!
podcasts.description: What do you do when you encounter a bad boss? How do you handle the Boss’s expectations especially if you know they are a Bad Boss ? It is simple until it is not simple……A good or bad boss are often there in your career to help you grow and bring out the best in you if only you have a positive attitude. Listen out to my Bad Boss experience-It could encourage you!! Don’t worry-I made it through….be encouraged….This too shall pass!
podcasts.iframe: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/episode/5OFr2lnpENiXrrb8IJBk8Q?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="150" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

podcasts.title: Watch the Tide & Jump Ship
podcasts.description: Are you facing organizational changes at your work place? This episode seeks to highlight some practical steps one can use as they watch the tide at their work place and generally any situation in life and make informed decisions as to whether to jump ship or to stay and above all - be happy and content with the decision they have made.
podcasts.iframe: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/episode/0ObF4sMVdJguKhMYdVSBK3?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="150" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

podcasts.title: Thriving at Work
podcasts.description: Its important to work in a place where you thrive. Join me as I walk you through: 1.Importance of Thriving at the Work Place 2.Benefits of Thriving at the Work Place 3.As a leader- How do you keep your team engaged and thriving at the workplace 4.How to continually thrive at the work Place Learn & Implement this simple ways to Thrive in the Work Place and Keep Loving what you do, where you are at any given time.
podcasts.iframe: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/episode/70XSigsst7KiiU7fDQ1wdf?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="150" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

podcasts.title: That Alone Feeling!
podcasts.description: Have you ever gone through an experience that has left you feeling a sense of being alone? I highlight the 5 Steps which I use and perhaps that can use to help you know when to Engage or Disengage from the world as you figure yourself out in order to bounce back Stronger, Better and with Courage to pursue my walk with purpose and precision.
podcasts.iframe: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/episode/54vp3o5VtjtyUMFlpiNZwq?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="150" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

podcasts.title: Rollercoaster Emotions
podcasts.description: Unpacking the emotions that I underwent as I lost and after losing my job and taking you through the different All manner of emotions overcame me…..From fear of the unknown, what will people say? What will I tell people? Where do I even start with the job application process at a time where many companies were not hiring? Be encouraged that nothing lasts forever, you have to desire to see yourself arise from the bottom. You must have the courage for yourself and to pick yourself up and say-Well, I am down now-But I am not Out! Pick yourself….Re-evaluate your life’s goals. Where you are is not where you wanted to be but guess what-You can still make it to the top. Have the courage to dream again
podcasts.iframe: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/episode/4ZvPyRyuMjaKMuNbQIdi0r?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="150" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

podcasts.title: Opportunity HIT or MISS?
podcasts.description: Where are you now? Do you have time to reflect on this far you have come? To take stock of where you are verses your initial goal and dream for yourself? What opportunities have you missed in life? Deals that fell through the crack even after trying and putting your best foot forward? Have you been relentless, in pursuit of your dream? Have you followed through that missed opportunity and it actually turned around and became the door that has led you and grown you to be where you are? Has your dream changed over the years due to your circumstances? Are you true and authentic to you? Dream again- Keep dreaming and pursing your goal in life. Don’t let a missed opportunity deter you from pursuing your walk. Keep walking pursue all the opportunities that present themselves in your life.
podcasts.iframe: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/episode/39cf9FTAXvtDYePWa7uK8V?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="150" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

podcasts.title: Master your Fate
podcasts.description: What does it mean to Master your Fate? Listen in as I share with you some of the simple steps I apply to Help me master my Fate and Be the Captain of my Soul and destiny

podcasts.title: Legit Online World!
podcasts.description: Today we are joined by Johnson Maina whose career took off during the pandemic period and landed himself a legit online Job. Johnson aliomoka na Online Job!! Yes…..There is a whole new world out there on the Online Space, Take advantage of it. You never know where it would Land you.

podcasts.title: Do it Afraid!
podcasts.description: I am doing it afraid. I have not figured my entire future, But I have figured out today and I am doing it Afraid. Some days even when we know what to do, we may be faced with challenges that hinder us from progress. Some days even our circumstances begin to present themselves negatively-Nothing works. But we must be reminded that we shall keep keeping on-Aluta continua

podcasts.title: Being intentional
podcasts.description: Being intentional means you choose to make decisions and take action on what's important to you! We are joined in by Clarence Kore who shares his story of how he made it his job to get a job- He was intentional and he landed a swanky role in Dublin by being intentional. You too can pick a thing or two and be intentional regarding your career path.

podcasts.title: Authentically Me
podcasts.description: We all have different backgrounds and upbringing but hey-That’s it. This is all me, Authentic and Raw…..I don’t know how to do anything other than ME. We all have a story, memories that we cherish while others we don’t….Wont you walk your life authentically and true to pursue your passion and be the best you can.

podcasts.title: Alone but Not Alone, Get up and Walk
podcasts.description: Today we are joined by Kahiga Ngata who felt he was alone but not alone, how he got up and walked to steer his career to where he wanted.
podcasts.iframe: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/episode/2DeZWLuAKZjMS1MoaqF4J0?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="150" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

podcasts.title: WAke me up from this Dream
podcasts.description: In life, you can have it all going well for you-In your family, relationships, business and career. Then one day, boom! There is an unexpected shift, a change suddenly you feel like the carpet underneath your feet is lifted up under you! It takes courage to Arise; It takes courage to look at yourself and admit your situation then take steps towards rebuilding that which is broken. Seek hope that is in within you and have faith you will overcome and triumph. This is my walk- Arise in courage and Take a Walk in your life’s journey.
podcasts.iframe: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/episode/5qcraiTDWKBlONwfp3dlbV?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="150" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
